title: Information determined by delivery truck database

content.prompt: Using only the information in the database, which of the following questions CANNOT be answered?

choices.label: On which day in a particular range of dates did the greatest number of trucks enter and leave the depot?
What is the average number of customer deliveries made by each truck on a particular day?
What is the change in weight of a particular truck between when it entered and left the depot?
Which truck has the shortest average time spent at the depot on a particular day?

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
